actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from treatment as an industrial development certain bond issues the proceeds of which are used for facilities for the furnishing of water and hydroelectric energy, or either.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax exclusion for the interest on governmental bonds the proceeds of which are used for facilities to furnish hydroelectric energy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from treatment as an industrial development certain bond issues the proceeds of which are used for facilities for the furnishing of water and hydroelectric energy, or either.
